rules_text:
[i](As an Arena enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it converted for free.)[/i]
When this battle enters, you may mill two cards. Then return up two creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
rules_text2: When you attack with exactly two creatures, they get +3/+3 and gain indestructible until end of turn.
flavor_text2: [i]As her enemy succumbed to Cenari's will, so too did the power of their friendship.[/i]
notes: each player mills four cards. You may return up to two creature cards with total mana value two or less from among those milled this way from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control.
